body.description: Product Description Scotch Magic Tape 810K6C38 Value Pack contains 6 rolls of tape and includes a Scotch C 38 classic black desktop office tape dispenser with weighted base. Scotch Magic Tape is the preferred tape for offices, homes and schools. It's invisible when applied and won't show on copies. This is an ideal tape for permanent paper mending. It can be written on with pen, pencil or marker, it pulls off the roll smoothly. Scotch Magic Tape cuts easily and is very reliable. Each roll of tape is 3/4 in. x 1000 in. with a 1 in. core. The tape is photo safe. From the Manufacturer In 1930, 3M engineer Richard Drew invented an attractive, moisture-proof material to help grocers and bakers seal up their packages. Over 70 years later, Scotch tape boasts over 400 varieties sold under the Scotch and 3M™ brands.Now indispensible in homes and offices, Scotch tapes offer specialty and general solutions for many projects--from crafts and gift-wrapping to mounting and everyday sealing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dispenser for the price
reviews.reviewText: The desktop Scotch tape dispenser is a handy tool that offers convenience and efficiency for all your taping needs. After using this tape dispenser for a while, I can confidently say that it's a reliable and practical addition to any workspace.One of the standout features of this desktop tape dispenser is its sturdy construction. Made from durable materials, it feels solid and capable of withstanding regular use without showing signs of wear. The weighted base adds stability, preventing the dispenser from sliding or toppling over during use. This feature is particularly important when you need to tear off a piece of tape quickly and smoothly.The design of the Scotch tape dispenser is simple and intuitive. It features a sharp cutting edge that effortlessly slices through the tape, ensuring clean and precise cuts every time. Additionally, the dispenser is designed to hold standard-sized Scotch tape rolls securely, preventing them from unraveling or becoming tangled. This helps to keep your workspace organized and prevents unnecessary wastage of tape.Another great feature of the desktop Scotch tape dispenser is its ease of use. With a single hand, you can pull out the desired length of tape and cut it using the built-in blade. The tape roll can be easily replaced when it runs out, making the whole process quick and hassle-free. This functionality is particularly useful when you're in a rush or have multiple tasks to complete.The desktop Scotch tape dispenser also offers a compact size, making it ideal for small to medium-sized workspaces. It takes up minimal desk space, allowing you to keep it within arm's reach without cluttering your area. This convenience ensures that you always have easy access to tape whenever you need it.One minor downside of the desktop Scotch tape dispenser is that it may require occasional cleaning, especially if adhesive residue builds up on the cutting edge. However, regular maintenance and wiping can prevent this issue and keep the dispenser in optimal working condition.In conclusion, the desktop Scotch tape dispenser is a reliable and practical tool that simplifies your taping tasks. Its sturdy construction, sharp cutting edge, and user-friendly design make it a valuable addition to any workspace. While it may need occasional cleaning, its overall performance and convenience outweigh this minor inconvenience. If you're looking for a durable and efficient tape dispenser for your desktop, the Scotch tape dispenser is a solid choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The dispenser is good quality and stays in place while tape is being dispensed. Nothing, in my opinion, adheres like Scotch brand tape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go-to dispenser for AGES
reviews.reviewText: I don't recall when 3m first came out with this dispenser, but it seems like it was a LONG time ago. I own 3 now. I wasn't going to buy a 3rd one until I compared prices between replacement tape rolls alone and this dispenser with replacement tape rolls included. Seemed silly NOT to get the dispenser for so little extra $$. I can gift one to a family member next time they need one. These are VERY solidly built, heavy enough to sit still as you pull tape off, and have a stylish look that I like. No down sides to report after many years of using these. For those who don't know, there's sand or something similar inside to add weight, so if the sound of sifting sand might annoy you when you move it, be aware of that. It doesn't bother me at all. Dispenses the included tape VERY well and easily with no issues. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this so that I have an extra tape dispenser and tape. My granddaughter is always stealing mine out of my office! This was very helpful in wrapping gifts. It was a great value as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wish I would have bought one of these sooner!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this when I was getting annoyed with individual tape dispensers. I love that this came with the dispenser and rolls of tape. The dispenser is great but I do wish the tape rolls were better quality. They hold great but if you lose the end of it, it is not very easy to find, and when you do find it it tore in random areas so I wasted a ton of tape. I may play around with other tapes once I run out of these, they are good enough for now.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tape. Nice dispenser. Put one everywhere
reviews.reviewText: I like tape dispensers everywhere. Great on a desk, or in the kitchen when you want to seal a bag of chips. This is a good deal for the price and great tape and dispenser.

reviews.reviewText: De lo mejores productos de papelería que son indispensables, lo que mas me gusto es que por ese precio te incluye el despachador de material muy resistente.

reviews.reviewTitle: One and Only Scotch MAgic Tape
reviews.reviewText: Scotch Magic Tape applies easily and the dispenser cuts the tape cleanly.The best thing about Magic Tape is that it comes off easily without tearing and it leaves little residue.It can also be reapplied if I make a mistake.
Good packaging. Excellent product straight from USA. Love it. Happy with both - Product and seller.
lesté et adhérent au support sur lequel il est posé : d'où une utilisation rapide, facile et bien pratique, d'une seule main
